price: Dájúdájú Àwa fún un ní ipò lórí ilẹ̀. A sì fún un ní ọ̀nà tó lè gbà ṣe gbogbo n̄ǹkan (tí ó bá fẹ́ ṣe).
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
